## RedemptionDetails.actualMEURAmount property

Amount of MEUR that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualMEURAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedMEURAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
